abstract: The Senate on Tuesday introduced legislation that would set new standards for stopping distance, push-button ignition systems, data recorders and electronic controls.
snippet: The Senate on Tuesday introduced legislation that would set new standards for stopping distance, push-button ignition systems, data recorders and electronic controls.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — Senators introduced on Tuesday their version of broad automobile safety legislation that would set new standards for stopping distance, push-button ignition systems, data recorders and electronic controls.

headline.main: Auto Safety Bill Includes Standard for Stopping
headline.print_headline: Senate’s Auto Safety Bill Includes Stopping-Distance Rule
